  • Constructor Details

    • AdminManager

      public AdminManager​(java.lang.String adminId) throws java.io.IOException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      This is used for the actions that an admin user can do
      Parameters:
      adminId - this is the user id of the admin account
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong with getting database
      UserNotFoundException - if the user id passed in doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - if the user id is of the wrong type

      Parameters:
      userID - the user id
      freezeStatus - to freeze the user
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - can't find user id

    • processItemRequest

      public void processItemRequest​(java.lang.String traderID, int itemIndex, boolean isAccepted) throws EntryNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Process the item request of a user
      Parameters:
      traderID - ID of the trader
      itemIndex - index of the item
      isAccepted - true if item is accepted, false if rejected
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - traderName / itemName not found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

    • setTradeLimit

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - couldn't get traders

      Changes the specified user's trade limit
      Parameters:
      userId - the user who's trade limit will be changed
      newLimit - the new trade limit
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user isn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader
